"The Photon Tree":
"About the Photon Tree

This is a special tree that emits powerful photons. Periodically, it will emit photons that are even more powerful than normal, and touching it during this time will have a variety of effects.

The frequency that support effects can be obtained can be improved by using Team Points to grow the tree."

"About Photon Water

The Photon Tree must be watered with Photon Water in order to maintain its power.

You can give it Photon Water at the cost of Team Points.
